Trigger.name: Mind Crush
Trigger.script:
local target = matches[2]
if matches[3] then system.hunting.vars.targetName = matches[3] system.hunting.vars.attacking = true target = matches[3] end
if system.hunting.funcs.isHuntingTarget(target) then system.hunting.funcs.razeShield() end

regexCodeList.string: ^(You) reach out with your mind, tightening its grip around (.+) to crush the life out of \w+\.$
^(.+) clutches \w+ sides and howls in pain\.$
